provider.name: CerealsDB
provider.description: A service to give information about SNP markers; e.g., the sequence upon which they are based, obtain primers used for their identification, identify the haplotypes of common UK varieties.

services.summary: A service to obtain contig information
services.description: A service to obtain contig information using SNP names, contig names or generic search terms

operations.description: An operation to obtain contig information using SNP or Contig names

parameters.name: SNP id
parameters.description: The SNP name (a 10 character alphanumeric beginning with 'BS' or 'BA'; e.g., BS00010624 or BA0033400) to find the contig to which it maps and all other putative SNPs, validated or not, that have been mapped to it. SNP names (IDs) may take different forms depending on the platform on which the assay was developed
